data.fullContent: Similar to Marshall McLuhan, Williams was fascinated by new media. However the key difference between them was that Williams focused more on how the technologies were formed in the first place, and how this impacted society. He was very critical of McLuhan. Raymond Williams's approach to cultural determinism is inspired by Marxism and the Frankfurt School. It is based on the concept that culture is determined by the zeitgeist, and that it is a production-based view of culture, that builds on the class-based approach of Marxism and the studies of Gramsci, Marcuse and hegemony.
data.answer: 与马歇尔·麦克卢汉(Marshall McLuhan)相似，威廉姆斯也对新媒体着迷。然而，他们之间的关键区别在于，威廉姆斯更关注技术最初是如何形成的，以及它是如何影响社会的。他对麦克卢汉非常不满。雷蒙德·威廉姆斯的文化决定论受到马克思主义和法兰克福学派的启发。它建立在文化由时代精神所决定的观念和以生产为基础的文化观的基础上，建立在马克思主义以阶级为基础的研究方法和葛兰西、马尔库塞和霸权的研究基础上。
